title: The wartime SAS and Hitler’s drug addiction
itunes:title: The wartime SAS and Hitler’s drug addiction
itunes:subtitle: Author and broadcaster Ben Macintyre details the extraordinary activities of the Special Air Service in the fight against the Axis, based on research for his new authorised history. Meanwhile, we speak to the German writer Norman Ohler whose sensationa...
description:
Author and broadcaster Ben Macintyre details the extraordinary activities of the Special Air Service in the fight against the Axis, based on research for his new authorised history. Meanwhile, we speak to the German writer Norman Ohler whose sensational book Blitzed highlights the astonishing extent of drug use in the Third Reich

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
